question: Ok I was wondering what I should do I was on my skateboard and i fell and hitting head it was scraped up?
question_content: Ok I was wondering what I should do I was on my skateboard and i fell and hitting head it was scraped up?

answers.answer_content: You should get checked for a concussion if you hit your head hard. Also get yourself a helmet, their is nothing cool about head injuries. Skate safe and live to skate another day...
